label: PWS microservice for $ARCH2
description: Provides a REST API to query Personal Weather Station (PWS) results

userInput.name: PWS_WU_ID
userInput.label: The Station ID of your PWS, assigned by Weather Underground (KCAENCIN78, etc)

userInput.name: PWS_WU_KEY
userInput.label: The Station Key, assigned by Weather Underground (762WT5E8, etc) for data upload

userInput.name: PWS_WU_RPDF
userInput.label: 'Rapidfire' setting for WU data upload (True=up to every 2.5 seconds, station dependent)
